text.__SUMMARY__: Nesiodostomia montforti is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.Nesiodostomia montforti as a replacement name for Odostomia secunda, itself a synonym of Eulimella secunda (Pilsbry, 1918)
